From: Florian Haftmann <florian.haftmann@informatik.tu-muenchen.de>
Hi all,

for the recent RC announcements, there has been the tendency to post
issues just as follow ups.

I would appreciate separate threads with distinct subjects; the
all-in-one bunches make it difficult for casual followers to find out
what the current issues under observations are, and to make contributions.

Thanks a lot,
Florian
